description: Crosshub is a fintech × deep tech startup that solves digital identity verification issues for foreigners using blockchain-based DID (Decentralized Identity) technology.
Beyond simple authentication, we help global users enter the digital financial ecosystem safely and quickly, aiming to lead the digital transformation (DX) of the fintech industry.

descriptionLinked: We change the market with our technology,
We're making global expansion into Vietnam, Japan, Singapore, and the U.S. a reality
And we’re looking for teammates to grow and take on challenges with us.

contents.contentTitle: We’re Looking for People Like This
description: We’re not just looking for someone who’s good at work — we want true teammates who grow, challenge themselves, and think with us.
descriptionBulletList: People curious about new technologies and problem-solving
Those who enjoy learning and growing fast
People interested in all aspects of the product from planning to design to development
Those unafraid to take on unfamiliar tech stacks
People who radiate positivity and energize those around them
Those interested or skilled in multicultural environments and second languages

Review new business opportunities (strategic projects and execution plans)

descriptionBulletList_2: At least 1 year of relevant experience
Development languages: Java, Node.js, Nest.js, TypeScript, etc.
descriptionBulletList_3: Fluent in English/Japanese communication (supporting overseas projects, negotiation, and interpretation)

descriptionLinked: Applicants are encouraged to submit the following documents in any format.
We value your story and potential more than formal documents.
descriptionNumberList: Any additional materials or stories you'd like to share (optional)

descriptionLinked: Our recruitment process is swift and flexible,
designed to engage in genuine conversations with each applicant.

descriptionBulletList: All documents should be submitted in PDF format.
Ensure that any portfolio or project links are accessible.
Results of the document review will be communicated individually.
Providing false information may result in disqualification.
Please ensure all information is accurate and truthful.
Submitted documents will not be returned and will be disposed of in accordance with relevant laws after the recruitment process.
The recruitment schedule may change depending on circumstances; any changes will be communicated individually.
Multiple applications are allowed, but please avoid applying multiple times for the same position.
